feed.title: Leantime Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.0.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

Other Changes

  • Added milestone and tags to all timesheet view by @cableman in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2267
  • Plugin settings minor markup fix by @cableman in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2268
  • Updated code style for commands by @cableman in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2269
  • Updated code style for helper and views by @cableman in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2270
  • Updated code style for API classes by @cableman in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2271
  • Image fixes by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2274
  • quote fixes across all language files by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2275
  • versionbump by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2276

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/compare/v3.0.3...v3.0.4

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.0.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Timesheet table format fixed
  • Timesheet descriptions for the same day and billing type now get concatenated
  • Security bug fixes
  • Download file issue when using OIDC
  • Fixed 2fa redirect bug
  • Fixed board creation bug
  • Fixed file upload bug

Other Changes

  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2277
  • Timesheet updaets by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2281
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2282
  • Timeline2 milestone by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2283
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2284
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2287
  • Download files issue when using OIDC login provider by @sy-gpe in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2238
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2288

New Contributors

  • @sy-gpe made their first contribution in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2238

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/compare/v3.0.4...v3.0.5

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.0.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

Other Changes

  • A few German translations added. by @Elaktrato in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2290
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2292
  • Fix milestone dates not saved and theme settings not saved by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2294
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2295
  • Promote plugins by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2296
  • Fixing Subtask Link not opening on same page by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2297
  • fix error on empty status by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2298

New Contributors

  • @Elaktrato made their first contribution in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2290

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/compare/v3.0.5...v3.0.6

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.0.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

Other Changes

  • pad strings to ensure timeline sorting is correct by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2301
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2299
  • Translations for formal and informal German by @Elaktrato in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2302
  • Reset invite code if not set by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2303
  • Improve project hub, speed improvals, fix favorite flow by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2305
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2304
  • Fixes and improvements to project hub by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2307
  • Project hub updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2308
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2306
  • Update Cast.php by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2317
  • Filter for notifications by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2318
  • Timesheet issue by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2319
  • Updated code style for API classes - part II by @cableman in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2325
  • Updated code style for calendar namespace by @cableman in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2327
  • Added PR template for easier review process by @cableman in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2328
  • fix timezone issues on timesheet management by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2341
  • Ical fix by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2344
  • Moved all testing into docker containers by @cableman in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2340
  • Delete old screenshots by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2345
  • Enable View Transitions for smooth transitions between page loads by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2347
  • Updated code style for audit namespace by @cableman in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2326
  • [Snyk] Upgrade gridstack from 10.0.1 to 10.1.0 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2348
  • Onboarding improvements by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2349
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2350
  • Misc fixes by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2351

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/compare/v3.0.6...v3.0.7

entry.title: New release for Leantime: Leantime v3.1.0-beta
entry.content:
What's Changed

Other Changes

  • Timesheets code style by @cableman in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2354
  • 2356: Fixed typo in parameter name by @rimi-itk in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2357
  • 2358: Fixed call to undefined method by @jekuaitk in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2359
  • A fix for mime types handling by @wizardeur in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2362
  • Timesheet fixes by @cableman in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2361
  • [Snyk] Upgrade @sentry/browser from 7.98.0 to 7.100.1 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2365
  • Revert "Timesheet fixes" by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2367
  • Added plugin commands by @rimi-itk in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2364
  • [Snyk] Upgrade datatables.net from 1.13.8 to 1.13.10 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2369

  • 2373: Updated ticket fetching SQL by @jekuaitk in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2374

  • ITKDev: Ensure that all acceptance test are executed by @cableman in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2376
  • Timesheet fixes - retry - part II by @cableman in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2372
  • Timesheets acceptance tests by @cableman in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2377
  • Issue 2392 by @rimi-itk in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2393
  • Added check for plugin enabled on settings link by @rimi-itk in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2390
  • Fixed user mentions by @rimi-itk in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2394
  • [Snyk] Upgrade uppy from 3.21.0 to 3.22.1 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2400
  • [Snyk] Upgrade @sentry/browser from 7.100.1 to 7.102.0 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2399
  • 2403 Added en-US translation by @vid-pas in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2404

  • 2401 updating csv import url by @vid-pas in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2402

  • Set init value of $_SESSION['currentProject'] to 0 instead of '' by @NaBuLSiO in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2414
  • [Snyk] Upgrade @sentry/webpack-plugin from 2.10.3 to 2.14.2 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2408
  • [Snyk] Upgrade fullcalendar from 6.1.10 to 6.1.11 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2410
  • [Snyk] Upgrade @fullcalendar/google-calendar from 6.1.10 to 6.1.11 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2411
  • [Snyk] Upgrade @fullcalendar/luxon3 from 6.1.10 to 6.1.11 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2409
  • [Snyk] Upgrade @fullcalendar/icalendar from 6.1.10 to 6.1.11 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2412
  • Resolve LDAP naming conventions 2289 & 2080 by @compumatter in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2387
  • [Snyk] Upgrade @sentry/browser from 7.102.0 to 7.102.1 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2418
  • [Snyk] Upgrade uppy from 3.22.1 to 3.22.2 by @broskees in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2417
  • Refactoring timesheets by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2386
  • updates to tests by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2420
  • New Crowdin updates by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2406
  • Misc ux fixes by @marcelfolaron in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2421

New Contributors

  • @rimi-itk made their first contribution in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2357
  • @jekuaitk made their first contribution in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2359
  • @wizardeur made their first contribution in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2362
  • @vid-pas made their first contribution in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2404
  • @NaBuLSiO made their first contribution in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2414
  • @compumatter made their first contribution in https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/pull/2387

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Leantime/leantime/compare/v3.0.7...v3.1.0-beta
